collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines our commitments and your
rights regarding the collection, use, and protection of your personal
information.

#### [](https://community.openai.com/t/privacy-policy-urls-for-gpt-
actions/502751/5#information-collection-3)Information Collection

**What We Collect:**

  * We collect information necessary to provide our services, such as queries and interaction data with our ChatGPT assistant.
* We do not collect personal identification information unless voluntarily provided by you for specific services.

**How We Collect:**

  * Information is collected through your interaction with our services and voluntary disclosures.
* AIMONEYGEN does not collect, share, nor use personally identifiable data in any way.
sharing: * AIMONEYGEN does not collect, share, nor use personally identifiable data in any way.

#### [](https://community.openai.com/t/privacy-policy-urls-for-gpt-
actions/502751/5#data-sharing-and-disclosure-5)Data Sharing and Disclosure

  * AIMONEYGEN does not share any user information with third parties.
* We do not disclose user information publicly or to any external entities, except as required by law.
